name: language-matlab
description: Edit MATLAB code with syntax highlighting, linting, navigation support, and more

MATLAB.installPath.markdownDescription: The full path to the top-level directory of the MATLAB installation you want to use with this extension. You can determine the full path to your MATLAB installation using the `matlabroot` command in MATLAB. For more information, refer to the [README](https://github.com/mathworks/MATLAB-extension-for-vscode/blob/main/README.md).

MATLAB.matlabConnectionTiming.description: Choose when this extension starts MATLAB in the background. Some functionality will be unavailable without MATLAB running in the background.
enumDescriptions: Start MATLAB as soon as a MATLAB code file is opened
Start MATLAB when needed for a given action

MATLAB.indexWorkspace.description: Automatically index all MATLAB code files (.m) in the current workspace.

MATLAB.telemetry.markdownDescription: Help improve this extension by sending user experience information to MathWorks. For more information, see the [MathWorks Privacy Policy](https://www.mathworks.com/company/aboutus/policies_statements.html).

scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile && cd server && npm prune --production && cd ..
scripts.compile: tsc -p ./ && cd server && npm run compile && cd ..
scripts.watch: tsc -watch -p ./ && cd server && npm run watch && cd ..
scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run copy-test-files
